bibl.title: Les céramiques en Anatolie aux époques hellénistique et romaine. Actes de la Table Ronde d'Istanbul, 22-24 mai 1996
bibl.note: Sagalassos and its potter's quarter. - 2. Alexandria, the trade capital. - 3. Exchange of goods: 3.1. Ceramics; - 3.2. Other goods. - 4. Exchange of persons. - Focuses on Sagalassos red slip ware found at Egyptian sites [Alexandria, Memphis, the Fayoum, Hermopolis Magna and Nubian Pharas] and places these in a wider context of trade and exchange patterns.
